en.title: FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner 27th September 2008 (1)
en.content:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner held at PGRM Hall, Cheras, KL, on 27th September 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1600 Leaders, Members, VIIPs and invited guests (FE apologise to the 400 odd Members who could not get seats as the tables were fully sold ). The Event was attended by many FE Leaders,Members and Guests from all over Malaysia and overseas from Singapore, Brunei, Indonesia, Philippines, India, New Zealand, Australia, UK, Dubai, China, Thailand, etc. FE would like to congratulate Presidential Director Jangkij from Thailand who brought a contingent of 90 FE Leaders with him (incl 8 new PD's, 5 new ED's and 25 Directors) to be recognised on the stage. Congratulations and Well Done, Jangkij!

VIPs who attended include Zakaria Ab Rahim (Selangor Football Team Manager), Gavin O' Luanaigh (Director, Masters Football Asia), Samboy Lim (FE Spokesman , Legendary '' Skywalker" of PBA  and Team Manager, Ginebra Kings, Champion Basketball Team of Philippines), Allan Caidic (FE Spokesman, Legendary " Triggerman" of PBA and Coach of Ginebra Kings), Rexy Mainaky (FE Spokesman, Malaysia National Badminton Coach, World Badminton Champion and Olympic Gold Medallist), Foo Kok Keong (FE Spokesman and World Badminton Champion), Wong Hong (FE Spokesman and World Class Body Builder), Bathi Allimuthu (FE Spokesman and World Kick Boxing Champion), Jean Daniels (FE Spokesman and International Long Drive Golf Specialist), Taekwondo Grand Master Ricky Wong, Datuk Paul Chan (VP Asia, International Federation Body Builders), Dr Amir Farid (FE Medical Consultant), Dr Siva (FE Medical Consultant), Dr Edwards (FE Trainer and Consultant), Carol Lee (former Miss Malaysia- Chinese International and RTM Channel 2 News Broadcaster), James Wong, Zoee Tan, Aenie Wong, Frederick Lee (Actors and Actresses and Stars of " The Legacy of a Lost Love" - an FE sponsored movie).

Highlights of the Event include:

- Dance Performances by KL Dance Association and by the children of House of Joy Orphanage.

- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.

- Product Demo of FE's new Quantum Spa and Quantum Water by PD KC Phoon who as usual draws   the crowd's attention.

- Promotion and Demo by Jean Daniels on FE's National Long Drive Golf Challenge starting on 18th   Oct 2008 in Penang. Wow, what a swing! And Audience, REPEAT, PLEASE DO NOT attempt this   demo at home!

- Mock Cheque Presentations to Jean Daniels (RM 500,00 for Long Drive Challenge) ,Reverand Tang   (RM 34,400 donation to House of Joy Orphanage) and to James Wong (RM 50,000 for Sponsoring   movie " The Legacy of a Lost Love").

- Certicate Presentation to SON Chinese Graduates.

- Sharing of Testimonials by Rexy Mainaky, Samboy Lim and Allan Caidic.

- Installation of New FE Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations!

- Sharing by PD Rachel Thomas.This Grandmother has made it!!  We are so proud of you!

- Sharing and Closing Speech by PD KC Phoon. It is always great to hear KC talk about his    experience. Truly inspirational stuff!  Keep it up, KC!  The sky is the limit!
 
< Click here for more photos >

Congratulations and Well Done, Jangkij!

- Product Demo of FE's new Quantum Spa and Quantum Water by PD KC Phoon who as usual draws the crowd's attention.
- Promotion and Demo by Jean Daniels on FE's National Long Drive Golf Challenge starting on 18th Oct 2008 in Penang. Wow, what a swing! And Audience, REPEAT, PLEASE DO NOT attempt this demo at home!

- Sharing and Closing Speech by PD KC Phoon. It is always great to hear KC talk about his experience. Truly inspirational stuff! Keep it up, KC! The sky is the limit!
meta.author: klhunter

meta.description:
FE's Achievers Recognition Dinner held at PGRM Hall, Cheras, KL, on 27th September 2008 was a GREAT SUCCESS with 1600 Leaders, Members, VIIPs and invited guests (FE apologise to the 400 odd Members who could not get seats as the tables were fully sold ). The Event was attended by many FE Leaders,Members and Guests from all over Malaysia and overseas from Singapore, Brunei, Indonesia, Philippines, India, New Zealand, Australia, UK, Dubai, China, Thailand, etc. FE would like to congratulate Presidential Director Jangkij from Thailand who brought a contingent of 90 FE Leaders with him (incl 8 new PD's, 5 new ED's and 25 Directors) to be recognised on the stage. Congratulations and Well Done, Jangkij!
VIPs who attended include Zakaria Ab Rahim (Selangor Football Team Manager), Gavin O' Luanaigh (Director, Masters Football Asia), Samboy Lim (FE Spokesman , Legendary '' Skywalker" of PBA and Team Manager, Ginebra Kings, Champion Basketball Team of Philippines), Allan Caidic (FE Spokesman, Legendary " Triggerman" of PBA and Coach of Ginebra Kings), Rexy Mainaky (FE Spokesman, Malaysia National Badminton Coach, World Badminton Champion and Olympic Gold Medallist), Foo Kok Keong (FE Spokesman and World Badminton Champion), Wong Hong (FE Spokesman and World Class Body Builder), Bathi Allimuthu (FE Spokesman and World Kick Boxing Champion), Jean Daniels (FE Spokesman and International Long Drive Golf Specialist), Taekwondo Grand Master Ricky Wong, Datuk Paul Chan (VP Asia, International Federation Body Builders), Dr Amir Farid (FE Medical Consultant), Dr Siva (FE Medical Consultant), Dr Edwards (FE Trainer and Consultant), Carol Lee (former Miss Malaysia- Chinese International and RTM Channel 2 News Broadcaster), James Wong, Zoee Tan, Aenie Wong, Frederick Lee (Actors and Actresses and Stars of " The Legacy of a Lost Love" - an FE sponsored movie).
Highlights of the Event include:
- Dance Performances by KL Dance Association and by the children of House of Joy Orphanage.
- Opening Speech by FE Founder Director KS Lee.
- Product Demo of FE's new Quantum Spa and Quantum Water by PD KC Phoon who as usual draws the crowd's attention.
- Promotion and Demo by Jean Daniels on FE's National Long Drive Golf Challenge starting on 18th Oct 2008 in Penang. Wow, what a swing! And Audience, REPEAT, PLEASE DO NOT attempt this demo at home!
- Mock Cheque Presentations to Jean Daniels (RM 500,00 for Long Drive Challenge) ,Reverand Tang (RM 34,400 donation to House of Joy Orphanage) and to James Wong (RM 50,000 for Sponsoring movie " The Legacy of a Lost Love").
- Certicate Presentation to SON Chinese Graduates.
- Sharing of Testimonials by Rexy Mainaky, Samboy Lim and Allan Caidic.
- Installation of New FE Directors, Executive Directors and Presidential Directors. Congratulations!
- Sharing by PD Rachel Thomas.This Grandmother has made it!! We are so proud of you!
- Sharing and Closing Speech by PD KC Phoon. It is always great to hear KC talk about his experience. Truly inspirational stuff! Keep it up, KC! The sky is the limit!
